zone.line: Plato, following the doctrine of Timaeus &
Pythagorus, taught also a moral &
intellectual system of doctrine comprehending
-hending at once the past the present
& the future condition of man.
Jesus Christ divulged the sacred &
eternal truths contained in these views
to mankind, & Christianity, in its abstract
purity, became the exoteric expression
of the esoteric doctrines of the poetry
& wisdom of antiquity. The incorporation
-poration of the Celtic nations with the
exhausted population of the South, impressed
-pressed upon it the figure of the
poetry existing in their mythology &
institutions. The result was a sum
all the causes included in
of the action & reaction of these events;
for it may be assumed as a maxim
that no nation or religion can overcome
supersede any other without blendin
incorporating into itself a portion
